value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|The castle. It's the same as ours.$k$pI'll go inside. You wait here.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Er, well... We're happy to help
with your research...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You misunderstand me. I am
cooperating with you only as much
as is necessary to destroy Hel.$k$pI have no intention of letting my foes
wander around my castle.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Er... You've made yourself clear.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Now hurry. Your enemy has arrived,
Prince Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Him!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Líf!$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Alfonse...$k$pYour world. My world. This is the
choice I face.$k$pI...$k$pI end lives only to save lives.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What does that mean?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|I broke open a terrible curse...
and performed a forbidden rite.
It was all to defeat Hel...$k$pIt was a terrible mistake. Everyone
in Askr died, one by one...and I am
to blame for it.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|I was desperate to defeat Hel. I
made a dangerous wager, and I
lost. We all did. Hel won.$k$pHel killed my sister... Sharena gave
everything to try and protect me.
Her last words were, "Save yourself."$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Sharena...$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|And in the end...after everything...
Hel bade me balance the cohort of
the dead.$k$pWhen someone from another realm
dies...someone here is saved.$k$pIt would be like no one ever died...
Even Sharena...$k$pOn those terms, I forged a contract
with Hel. To save our world...I will
decimate yours.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|No! To think I'd serve Hel... Have
you lost your mind?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Lose my mind? How could I not?$k$pIt was all my fault... The people
of Askr and Sharena... Even
$Nu...$k$pMy sanity...it died with them.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I cannot fall here... I must stop them.
I must save my people...$k$pI must balance the cohort of the
dead.$k$p$Sbs150|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|It seems your foe has fled. What a
vengeful creature...$k$pThe prince Alfonse...of this Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Were you able to find any information
about the rite?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Angrboða's Heart. That is what the
ceremony requires.$k$pAngrboða is a being of great power...
It was Angrboða who gave birth to
Hel herself.$k$pBy harnessing Angrboða's power,
we can kill Hel.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|But the curse...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Yes. The heart is sealed within an
Emblian blood temple.$k$pIf that seal is broken, someone will
die each time the heart beats...$k$pThose who perform the rite are
the first to die. All die, eventually...
One by one.$k$pWhen all are dead, the heart grows
quiet once again...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We can't do this.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|I wonder...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You wonder?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|We cannot perform the rite in our
world, of course.$k$pBut the ceremony has already been
performed here.$k$pIt must be here. Somewhere.$k$pThe weapon born of the Heart's
Rite.$k$pThe weapon that can kill Hel...$k$p$Sbs150|
